Reviews.Content: brand walking distance space needle monorail staff pleasant helpful especially regard directions nearby eat perfect bigger expected hotel clean indoor pool kids enjoyed wifi free free computers lobby parking nextdoor parking garage connects hotel underground shared condo complex cost 10 day actually cheaper hotels continental breakfast morning adequate pay upgrade ate included upgrade eggs bacon hot foods expensive speaking food frontdesk maintains snack desserts drinks nice somewhat costly cheaper alternative walk street walgreens buy speaking savings day checkout drove 5 miles costco purchased 100 hyatt gift certificates saved 60 final bill checkout front desk staff rate allows gift certificates told fine type transaction booked priceline hotwire brokers allow funds paid directly hyatt overall outstanding dont snob buy am honestly picky hotels bit hotels maintained stay highly recommend am actually surprised isnt ranked stay seattle website

Reviews.Title: “Brand New, Great Location, Would Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: thegov
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 8 days awesome perfect view space needle amazing hd flat panel tv free wifi nice layout considering hotels seattle price okay extra fee car parking reasonable found easy walk downtown concept hyatt similar aloft hotel self service check kiosks own breakfast bar modern hip cool lobby etc main improve breakfast included breakfast basically option fruit bread bagels cereal muffins toast nice eggs turkey bacon etc option pay issue checkin system didnt recognize gold passport chalk hotel systems properly configured stay rate

Reviews.Title: “Very nice rooms and staff, breakfast poor, some problems”

Reviews.Content: start positives brand hotel excellent condition beds comfy nice flat screen television walking distance space needle staff nice gym excellent negatives breakfast worst continental breakfasts hotel stayed toaster constantly limited selection pool freezing mainly children adults cold guess trying plan people check themselves people desk front desk employee supposed cook front desk person waits front desk keys elevators doors times wait front desk inconvenient wait desk heating cinnamon rolls guest job acceptable budget hotel nearly 200 night hopefully time quirks normally lower rating staffs nice prepared negatives mentioned
